abstract: Children's Aid Society, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Mercedes Rodriguez buy clothing for her children and pay back rent.

headline.print_headline: Childhood Crush Comes Back Into View in New York
headline.main: A Childhood Crush Comes Back Into View in New York

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: An accidental confession of affection during a video chat brought together a woman in New York and a man she had admired from afar when she was growing up in the Dominican Republic.
lead_paragraph: An accidental confession of affection during a video chat brought together a woman in New York and a man she had admired from afar when she was growing up in the Dominican Republic.
